messages.content:
I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Kyle, Mark, Max, Jordan

Here are the rules of the game: Mark & Jordan against Kyle & Max in scotch, 8 point game. $4 each point, goes to $8 once someone goes down $70.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Kyle","pops":[]},{"name":"Mark","pops":[]},{"name":"Max","pops":[]},{"name":"Jordan","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Kyle","Mark","Max","Jordan"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Who had the longest drive?","answers":["Kyle","Mark","Max","Jordan"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Which team had the fewest putts?","answers":["Mark & Jordan","Kyle & Max"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Steve, Ali, Kyle, Mark

Here are the rules of the game: Kyle & Ali vs Mark & Steve in scotch, 6 point game. $6 each point, points go to $12 once someone goes down $70. Hammers and double hammers allowed.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Steve","pops":[]},{"name":"Ali","pops":[]},{"name":"Kyle","pops":[]},{"name":"Mark","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Steve","Ali","Kyle","Mark"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}

I'm playing a golf match and want you to keep score.

Golfers: Max, Jordan, Viktor, Joe

Here are the rules of the game: 6 point bridge game, Joe & Max taking on Jordan & Viktor. $2/point, but ups to $4 after the front 9. Hammers and double hammers allowed each hole. Miracles in play.

Generate a JSON object with the questions and stroke holes needed to score it. Respond ONLY with valid raw JSON.

{"strokes":[{"name":"Max","pops":[]},{"name":"Jordan","pops":[]},{"name":"Viktor","pops":[]},{"name":"Joe","pops":[]}],"questions":[{"question":"Who got the point for proximity?","answers":["Max","Jordan","Viktor","Joe"],"numberOfAnswers":2,"holes":"all"},{"question":"Was there a press or double press?","answers":["Press","Double Press"],"numberOfAnswers":1,"holes":"all"}]}
